name: The Eva Holocaust Experience - Historic Tour of the Auschwitz Concentration Camp
summary: Imagine being transported to one of the most significant and somber sites of the 20th century, Auschwitz, and experiencing the story of a survivor in a deeply personal and immersive way. The Eva Holocaust Experience Virtual Reality Tour offers a unique and unforgettable journey, putting you in the shoes of Eva Mozes Kor, a survivor of the Holocaust and the infamous Mengele Twins experiments.
